title: Foxpup
author: Foxpup
created_time: March 15, 2023, 06:20:12 PMLast edit: March 16, 2023, 12:10:44 AM by Foxpup
content: Has it really been four years? It's hard to believe that what started as a practical joke all those years ago would get quite this out of hand, but here we are. It has led to so much mischief and controversy of the sort perfectly becoming of a fox: a gay prostitution and/or pornography scandal, me winning Miss Bitcointalk twice despite confusion* as to whether I qualify, and many more shenanigans both public and private (including this one). None of this would be possible without the support of my loyal band of foxhole felchers, followers, and wannabes (you know who you are). And so, as promised last year, I am celebrating by offering a new peek into everybody's favourite foxhole. (Peek linked offsite because SENSOR SHIPS.)*This thread should hopefully eliminate all pre-existing confusion and replace it with exciting new confusion. Admit it, this is what you all came here to see:ü¶ä GRATUITOUS VULPINE NUDITY ü¶ä(Image is very much not safe for work, unless you're talking about Measure B compliance - I always stay safe when engaging in this type of work.)Image copyright 2023 Foxpup. Model is over 18 years of age.(Alternative nude image link if Cloudflare's being... Cloudflare.)Now let's get this party started! üíìLocal rules: No transphobia, homophobia, trypophobia, etc. If you have a problem with certain kinds of holes, keep it to yourself; nobody's forcing you to look at them.EDIT: Added alternative image link using forum image proxy (hopefully theymos doesn't mind).

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.created_time: March 15, 2023, 06:32:41 PMLast edit: May 27, 2023, 11:44:16 AM by GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: Omg omg omg! The long waited day has finally arrived!Quote from: truth or dare on February 18, 2020, 06:15:22 PMfoxhole felchersIt's time to paaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaatyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy!!!

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Congratulations to 4 years, and thank you very much for having me in there all this time!I'll start the party with my favourite 38% Greek beverage

comments.author: o_e_l_e_o
comments.body: Four years really is a phenomenal achievement. I continue to be honored to be a member of this most exclusive of clubs!Quote from: Foxpup on March 15, 2023, 06:20:12 PMAdmit it, this is what you all came here to seeI've been waiting over 2 years for a fully uncensored version of this: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5293897.msg55699259#msg55699259. Glad that day has finally arrived!Quote from: Foxpup on March 15, 2023, 06:20:12 PMLocal rules: No transphobia, homophobia, trypophobia, etc.My only phobia is vestiphobia.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: o_e_l_e_o on March 15, 2023, 07:53:47 PMFour years really is a phenomenal achievement. I continue to be honored to be a member of this most exclusive of clubs!As am I, though I was late to the club.¬† My sense of time is warped like a fun house mirror, but I'm pretty sure the club had been up and running and conducting its practice of the dark arts well before I was invited to take part in the debauchery.¬† For that I am not only honored but extremely grateful.¬† That is not me kissing your ass, Foxpup; I'm genuinely grateful to you.¬† The anilingus I came for today is completely separate and we can start whenever you're ready.¬† As noted in the other thread, I'm in my birthday suit and rarin' to go--but I do need to top up my cocktail.¬† Damn zero-order pharmacokinetics of ethanol.And that friggin' gang stole my watch, Pup.¬† The knock to the head I took during that snatch made me unable to remember what UTC is.I've got so many more excuses, I can just crank them out as needed.¬† But enough of that.¬† I raise my glass and my ass to all of you fellow merit cyclers.¬† Let us celebrate our benefactor, leader, and master of ceremonies with all the drunken fervor the Fox of Foxes deserves.¬† Hear, hear!!

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on March 15, 2023, 10:03:54 PMFor that I am not only honored but extremely grateful. ¬†That is not me kissing your ass, Foxpup; I'm genuinely grateful to you.I also want to say that I am very grateful to our beloved Foxpup! What we have here is something never seen before!Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on March 15, 2023, 10:03:54 PMThe anilingus I came for today is completely separate and we can start whenever you're ready. ¬†As noted in the other thread, I'm in my birthday suitYup, we are all ready forQuote from: o_e_l_e_o on January 25, 2020, 08:37:30 PMQuote from: suchmoon on January 25, 2020, 08:33:18 PMpossibly some other chemicals.Only the finest, medicinal grade chemicals.forQuote from: suchmoon on January 25, 2020, 09:07:28 PMdark musty holesand forQuote from: icopress on April 21, 2021, 07:38:43 PM- What are the similarities between cunnilingus and the Sicilian mafia?- One wrong movement of the tongue - and you're in the ass.Quote from: suchmoon on April 21, 2021, 08:49:01 PMThere is no "wrong movement of the tongue" in the foxhole.¬†  Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on March 15, 2023, 10:03:54 PMAnd that friggin' gang stole my watch, Pup. ¬†The knock to the head I took during that snatch made me unable to remember what UTC is.Be happy it was our gang and not a Romanian Gypsy gang. If it were a Romanian Gypsy gang you'd also be out of your gold teeth Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on March 15, 2023, 10:03:54 PMI raise my glass and my ass to all of you fellow merit cyclers. Cheers to all! ¬†Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on March 15, 2023, 10:03:54 PMLet us celebrate our benefactor, leader, and master of ceremonies with all the drunken fervor the Fox of Foxes deserves. ¬†Hear, hear!!Amen, brother!The Queen of Foxes guides us. The Queen of Foxes teaches us. The Queen of Foxes protects us. In your light we thrive. In your mercy we are sheltered. In your wisdom we are humbled. We live only to serve. Our lives (+wives) are yours.P.S.: is it just me, or the link of that pic is not working? I get a "403 Forbidden" when trying to access it Oo

comments.author: fillippone
comments.body: It's 10 minutes from a new day, and this is the first good news I hear today. I opened a 14% wine glass bottle this night, and I drunk it almost entirely. I am now ready to celebrate this anniversary! Almost 4 years of continuous derailing of this thread!I might or I might not being in my birthday suit as well. As you might remember I am a filthy, mustachioed, lustful Italian

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: Congratulations Foxpup and Company!Quote from: fillippone on March 15, 2023, 11:52:09 PMIt's 10 minutes from a new day, and this is the first good news I hear today. I am sorry but Probably the worst news of the day is Chipmixer Was Seized. ChipMixer was seized by US and German authorities.1909.4 Bitcoin in 55 Transactions (44.2 Million Euro) with 7 TB Data seized. The most famous Mixer on this forum ended their journey.http://chipmixer.com/https://www.europol.europa.eu/media-press/newsroom/news/one-of-darkwebs-largest-cryptocurrency-laundromats-washed-outSorry for the off-topic in the off-topic.

comments.author: RickDeckard
comments.body: Four years is quite a ride in any venture, congratulations to everyone involved! I wonder, when the Club started, did anyone thought that it would last 4 years (for now)?As a side note, looking forward for all the fox related activities, both NSFW and SFW (if there are any ).

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: Learn Bitcoin on March 15, 2023, 11:58:12 PMI am sorry but Probably the worst news of the day is Chipmixer Was Seized. ChipMixer was seized by US and German authorities.1909.4 Bitcoin in 55 Transactions (44.2 Million Euro) with 7 TB Data seized. The most famous Mixer on this forum ended their journey.Yeh, I'm curious as to what they did besides mixing crypto--if anything; I suppose we'll find out eventually, but my first instinct was that the US government needed to pilfer someone or something that wasn't likely to put up much of a fight in order to finance their insane economic policies. ¬†But if Germany is in on it, I don't know what to think.Fukkin' buzzkill, you.Quote from: Foxpup on March 16, 2023, 12:10:58 AMRemember, the safeword is "fl√ºgg√•…ònk‚àÇ‚Ç¨ƒçhi≈ì√ü√∏l É√™n". Now you're just taking advantage of the chemically lobotomized at this point, like myself, who'd never figure out how to pronounce that...thing...in time so as to avoid internal hemorrhaging or some such cat-ass-trophy.¬† I be like "Slob fluggin' my blobbitynob, F-F-Foxxx...*".¬† And then you'll have me right where you want me, right?¬† A'ight then.

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on March 16, 2023, 01:44:03 AMQuote from: Learn Bitcoin on March 15, 2023, 11:58:12 PMI am sorry but Probably the worst news of the day is Chipmixer Was Seized. ChipMixer was seized by US and German authorities.1909.4 Bitcoin in 55 Transactions (44.2 Million Euro) with 7 TB Data seized. The most famous Mixer on this forum ended their journey.Yeh, I'm curious as to what they did besides mixing crypto--if anything; I suppose we'll find out eventually, but my first instinct was that the US government needed to pilfer someone or something that wasn't likely to put up much of a fight to finance their insane economic policies. ¬†But if Germany is in on it, I don't know what to think.Fukkin' buzzkill, you.They were accused of money laundering of 152000 BTC.They identified the founder and Wanted by the FBI.https://www.fbi.gov/wanted/cyber/minh-quoc-nguyenFour servers were seized with 7 TB of Data. It would be worst if they try to trace the output address and anyone gets in trouble from this forum. Quote from: https://cryptonews.net/news/security/20672845/According to Europol, ChipMixer has operated since 2017 and has facilitated the laundering of 152,000 Bitcoin (approx. $3.69 billion.) Lastly, the press release reads, ‚ÄúA large share of this is connected to darkweb markets, ransomware groups, illicit goods trafficking, procurement of child sexual exploitation material, and stolen crypto assets.‚ÄùIt was a joint operation that involved Europol and agencies from Belgium, Germany, Poland, Switzerland, and the United States.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: Learn Bitcoin on March 16, 2023, 02:53:45 AM<snip>Gotta axe the obvious question: who da fuk invited this dude to the party?¬† Please tell me this isn't some emotionally deflationary interlocuter who busted thru the security gate looking for a merit orgy.¬† That shit is in another section.¬† This here is where we don our ceremonial garb and sometimes touch each other where we pee.¬† I'm not sure Learn Bitcoin is either here for that or should be here for that.I smell bacon.

comments.author: Foxpup
comments.body: Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on March 16, 2023, 07:18:05 AMThat shit is in another section.Agreed. I'm willing to tolerate slight digressions from the scheduled orgy, but this is getting out of hand.Learn Bitcoin, we all know what happened to ChipMixer. There is no need to discuss it further in this thread unless it (somehow) directly relates to the Merit Cycling Club and this celebration of its shenanigans.
